QuestData.Title: Back to the Elementium Depths
QuestData.Description: The Earthcaller's initiate, Goldmine, has need of you.$B$BI think that they're ready for you to help them with whatever's down in that mine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Initiate Goldmine at the Elementium Depths in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: $n, glad you're back! Have I got something fun for us to do!
